epics.title: User Authentication and Security
epics.summary: Implement secure user authentication and security features
epics.description: Develop a multi-factor authentication system to ensure secure logins. Implement encryption protocols to protect sensitive financial data. Enable features for password recovery and account lockout after multiple failed attempts.

epics.title: Personalized Dashboard
epics.description: Design and build a personalized dashboard that displays available banking products and services based on user profile and eligibility. Ensure the dashboard provides an intuitive and user-friendly interface for easy navigation.

epics.title: Account Requests and Modifications
epics.summary: Implement functionality for account opening requests and modifications
epics.description: Develop workflows to allow customers to submit account opening requests and service modifications with minimal clicks. Ensure the process is streamlined and user-friendly.

epics.title: Real-Time Status Updates
epics.description: Implement a system to provide real-time status updates and email notifications regarding submitted requests. Ensure the updates are timely and accurate.

epics.title: Interaction History
epics.summary: Maintain a comprehensive history of user interactions
epics.description: Develop a feature to maintain a comprehensive history of all user interactions. Ensure the data is secure and easily accessible for the user.

epics.title: Responsive Design
epics.summary: Ensure the portal is responsive across various devices
epics.description: Develop a responsive design for the portal to provide a consistent experience across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. Ensure compatibility with different screen sizes and resolutions.

epics.title: Save Incomplete Applications
epics.summary: Allow users to save and return to incomplete applications
epics.description: Implement functionality to allow users to save incomplete applications and return to them at a later time. Enable users to upload necessary documentation directly through the interface.

epics.title: Core Banking Integration
epics.summary: Integrate the portal with the bank's core banking system
epics.description: Ensure seamless integration with the bank's existing core banking system. Maintain a separate database for the portal to ensure optimal performance and reliability.

epics.title: Role-Based Access Control
epics.description: Develop and implement role-based access controls to ensure users can only view and access services appropriate to their profile and authorization level.

user_stories.title: Multi-Factor Authentication
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to use multi-factor authentication, so that my login process is secure.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Implement multi-factor authentication using SMS or email codes.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. MFA prompt appears after entering correct password.
2. Code is sent to the registered phone or email.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I am on the login page, when I enter my password correctly, then I should receive a code to verify my identity.

user_stories.title: Encryption Protocols
user_stories.description: As a security admin, I want encryption protocols implemented, so that sensitive financial data is protected.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Implement AES-256 encryption for all financial data.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Financial data is encrypted in transit and at rest.
2. Decryption keys are securely managed.
user_stories.test_cases: Given sensitive data is being processed, then it should be encrypted before storage and during transmission.

user_stories.title: Password Recovery and Account Lockout
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to recover my password and have account lockout after multiple failed attempts, so that my account remains secure.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Allow password recovery via email. Lock account after 5 failed login attempts.
user_stories.core_domain_objects: user accounts, password recovery, account lockout
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. User can recover password via registered email.
2. Account locks after 5 failed attempts with notification sent to email.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user fails to login 5 times, when they attempt to login a 6th time, then their account should be locked and a notification sent to their email.

user_stories.title: Design Personalized Dashboard
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a personalized dashboard, so that I can easily access products and services relevant to me.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Dashboard should display content based on user profiles.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Display relevant products based on user profile.
2. Ensure easy navigation and usability.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I log into my account, when I access my dashboard, then I should see banking products and services relevant to my profile.

user_stories.title: Intuitive User Interface
user_stories.description: As a user, I want an intuitive and user-friendly interface on my dashboard, so that navigation is easy and seamless.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Design interface focusing on usability and accessibility.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Interface is intuitive and easy to navigate.
2. Accessibility standards are met for all users.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I am on the dashboard, when I navigate through the options, then I should find the interface intuitive and user-friendly.

user_stories.title: Streamlined Account Opening Process
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want a streamlined account opening process, so that I can open an account with minimal effort.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Minimize clicks required for account opening.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Account opening process requires minimal clicks.
2. User experience is smooth and intuitive.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I want to open a new account, when I navigate through the steps, then the process should be quick and require minimal clicks.

user_stories.title: Service Modification Requests
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to request service modifications easily, so that I can update my account without hassle.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure functionality for easy service modifications.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Modifications can be requested with minimal steps.
2. Interface guides the user through the process.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I want to modify my account services, when I submit a request, then the process should be smooth and straightforward.

user_stories.title: Implement Real-Time Status Updates
user_stories.description: As a user, I want real-time status updates, so that I am always informed about the status of my requests.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Provide real-time updates via the portal and email.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Status updates are timely and accurate.
2. Email notifications are sent promptly.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I have submitted a request, when there is a status update, then I should receive a real-time update on the portal and an email notification.

user_stories.title: Comprehensive Interaction History
user_stories.description: As a user, I want access to a comprehensive interaction history, so that I can review my past activities and transactions.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Retain and display user interaction history securely.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. History is easily accessible and secure.
2. Displays all past user interactions accurately.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I want to review my past activities, when I access interaction history, then I should see a complete and accurate record of all interactions.

user_stories.title: Responsive Portal Design
user_stories.description: As a user, I want the portal to be responsive across all devices, so that I have a consistent experience no matter what device I use.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure compatibility with desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Portal adapts to different screen sizes and resolutions.
2. Consistent user experience across devices.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I access the portal from any device, when I navigate through it, then the design should adjust to provide a consistent experience.

user_stories.title: Save and Resume Incomplete Applications
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to save incomplete applications and return to them later, so that I can complete them at my convenience.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Allow users to save progress and resume incomplete applications.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Users can save incomplete applications.
2. Users can resume applications from where they left off.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I am filling out an application, when I save it as incomplete, then I should be able to resume it later from the saved point.

user_stories.title: Integrate Core Banking System
user_stories.description: As an IT admin, I want the portal to be integrated with the core banking system, so that there is seamless data flow and reliability.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure seamless integration with the existing core banking system while maintaining a separate database.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Data flows seamlessly between portal and core banking system.
2. Portal maintains optimal performance with separate database management.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the portal is integrated with the core banking system, when data is processed, then it should flow seamlessly and maintain high performance.

user_stories.title: Role-Based Access Implementation
user_stories.description: As an admin, I want to implement role-based access controls, so that users only access services appropriate to their profile and authorization.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Define and implement access controls based on user profiles and roles.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Users only access services appropriate to their roles.
2. Access controls are enforced consistently.
user_stories.test_cases: Given users have different roles, when they attempt to access services, then they should only access those appropriate for their roles.

architecture_generation.description: A modern, user-friendly self-service banking portal architecture featuring frontend services, secure authentication, backend integration, data management, workflow automation, storage, performance monitoring, data security, and development/deployment capabilities.
